001.comments: Course is delivered entirely online via UBC Canvas.  To access the course module, go to www.canvas.ubc.ca

DL2.comments: Classroom location: SPPH B112Course will meet on selected Fridays, likely bi-weekly.  Meeting days and times will be finalized in Aug. 2020, and updated here.Please note, once the meeting times are finalized, because of DL course-conflict scheduling issues please double check to make sure this course does not conflict with any of the other courses you have registered in this term.
